summary: TIRES LOOSE THE CAP AT BETWEEN 3-6K MILES.  I HAVE HAD A COUPLE OF THEM LOOSE THE CAP AND STILL HOLD AIR FOR ABOUT 2-3 MILES TRYING TO FIND A PLACE I COULD PULL OFF OF THE HIGHWAY AND CHANGE TIRE. I WENT THROUGH 7 TIRES ON MY 24' COVERED TRAILER AND HAVE GONE THROUGH 3 ON MY CAR HAULER.  I WENT TO A FIRESTONE TIRE AND SOLVED THE PROBLEM ON THE COVERED TRAILER.  STILL HAVE A SET ON OF THE HIGH FAILURE RATE TIRES ON MY CAR HAULER. GETTING READY TO REPLACE THOSE ON THE CAR HAULER WITH THE SAME FIRESTONE TIRES.  OVER 12 K ON THE FIRESTONE AND NOT A SINGLE PROBLEM.   *NLM
